title: Social Media Manager + Content Creator
job_overview:
Hi all,

We are looking for a person that can take care of the following:
1. Create Content Plan for TikTok & Meta
2. Shoot Content with pets
3. Edit Videos / Graphic Design

THE JOB:
- Manage Social Media Accounts
- Create content 

OUR TEAM - TODAY:
- Paid Ads Manager
- Affiliate Manager
- Video Editor

--> We need you Content Manager and ideally content generator.

APPLICATION:
- Apply with at least >5 points
- Send your Portfolio
- Rate your English proficiency 1-10
- You need to have a dog or a cat to shot content + you need to be willing to make content of yourself

We are hiring full-time and on a permanent basis.

This is our company: Upgrade to see actual info
